PF2EBB.Settings.Debug.Title: Debugging
PF2EBB.Settings.Debug.ToggleHint: If checked, verbose debug logs will be printed to the browser console.
PF2EBB.Settings.ADF.Title: Avoid Dire Fate
PF2EBB.Settings.ADF.ToggleHint: If checked, will install a hook to consume the Harrow Omen effect if the Avoid Dire Fate button is pressed.  Token needs updated Avoid Dire Fate reaction.
PF2EBB.Settings.ED.Title: Escalation Die!
PF2EBB.Settings.ED.ToggleName: Give players a bone for long combats
PF2EBB.Settings.ED.ToggleHint: If checked, runs the Escalation Die! logic at combat start and whenever the combat round changes.
PF2EBB.Settings.ED.ShowBadgeHint: If checked, the Escalation Die effect icon shows a numeric badge matching the current value.
PF2EBB.Notif.ADF.On: PF2e Basement Buddies: Avoid Dire Fate installed.
PF2EBB.Notif.ADF.Off: PF2e Basement Buddies: Avoid Dire Fate removed.
PF2EBB.Notif.ED.On: PF2e Basement Buddies: Escalation Die! installed.
PF2EBB.Notif.ED.Off: PF2e Basement Buddies: Escalation Die! removed.
